abstract: The release of the filings, after similar releases for three other highly caffeinated energy drinks, appears to underscore the crazy-quilt regulatory pattern governing such products.
snippet: The release of the filings, after similar releases for three other highly caffeinated energy drinks, appears to underscore the crazy-quilt regulatory pattern governing such products.
lead_paragraph: The government publicly released reports Friday of injuries that cited the possible involvement of Red Bull, the country’s top-selling energy drink, just days after its producer said it was unaware of such cases.

headline.main: F.D.A. Posts Injury Data Citing Red Bull
headline.print_headline: F.D.A. Posts Injury Data For Red Bull
